author: mrodozov
body:
my update for master is stuck on the pip package (not the pyroot instalation which is in ROOT, but the pip package that depends on it, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5531#issuecomment-590374644) 
once the 1500 today IB is done we can test this
title: [ROOT master] Updated root to tip of branch master
